trailstone-acquires-u-s-oil-refining-co.title: TrailStone Acquires U.S. Oil and Refining Co
trailstone-acquires-u-s-oil-refining-co.description: TrailStone today announced that it has acquired U.S. Oil and Refining Co. (USOR).

trailstone-group-invests-in-mp2-energy.title: TrailStone Group Invests in MP2 Energy
trailstone-group-invests-in-mp2-energy.description: TrailStone NA Asset Holdings LLC has entered into a Membership Interest Purchase Agreement pursuant to which it has acquired a strategic equity interest in MP2 Energy LLC.
